meanings.definition: In a way that relates to education or learning.
meanings.sent1: She learns best educationally when using visual aids.
meanings.sent2: The teacher spoke educationally about the importance of reading.
meanings.sent3: The students educationally explored the wonders of science through experiments.
meanings.sent4: Her mind expanded educationally as she delved into new subjects.
meanings.sent5: The museum tour was educationally enriching for the students.
